ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 61
ygData.msgSnippet: Wouldn t a fair trade be (since I think SKs are balanced except for pets) be trade in pets for lifetap series?  Brad is always talking about how hybrids are
ygData.messageBody:
Wouldn't a fair trade be (since I think SKs are 'balanced' except for pets)
be trade in pets for lifetap series? Brad is always talking about how
hybrids are better at soloing...I mean we have an exp penalty for something
right? Right now we are as diverse as a warrior, we can do very little
except fight/cause damage. Rangers and paladins can root, heal, rangers can
track and have damage shield and agility buffs. Shadowknights don't have
the diversity their exp penalty should grant. Lifespike (10 dmg) should be
a lvl 9 spell, vampiric embrace moves to 15 and then the level 12 necro
lifetap is at 22....sound fair? I like it. As of the moment just getting
the lifetap series would be too powerful...and I'd trade ol Gebeker in any
day for a way to heal myself. Pets half our level end up attracting
monsters WE have to fight and kill, and then we have to heal off the damage
and they really end up causing a lot of unnecessary downtime. Besides I
think the shadowknight, paladin of evil, should have a more solo image, he's
supposed to be a mirror image of a paladin...so where did this gimpy
skeleton come from?
Just my thoughts.
